scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:eleventy && npm run build:sass && npm run build:frontend && rimraf dist/content
scripts.build:compile: npm run build:admin && npm run build:frontend
scripts.build:sass: node-sass src/partials/styles/global.scss dist/assets/styles/bp-uncompressed.css && ./node_modules/.bin/postcss dist/assets/styles/bp-uncompressed.css > dist/assets/styles/bp.css && rimraf dist/assets/styles/bp-uncompressed.css
scripts.lint: npm run lint:js && npm run lint:scss
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run build && npm run serve" "npm run watch"
scripts.watch: concurrently "npm run watch:js" "npm run watch:markup" "npm run watch:sass"
scripts.watch:js: onchange 'src/**/*.js' -- concurrently "npm run lint:js" "npm run build:rollup:frontend"
scripts.watch:sass: onchange 'src/**/*.scss' -- concurrently "npm run lint:scss" "npm run build:sass"
